title: Grover Mixer QAOA
subtitle: Solving Optimization problem using the QAOA algorithm with a Grover Mixer Variant
description: Implementation of QAOA with Grover mixers (GM-QAOA) for constrained optimization: the mixer is a parameterized Grover diffuser over the feasible subspace. The notebook builds GM-QAOA in Classiq and solves a sample constrained problem.
